channel.title: Attention on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Attention on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Come dream with me
item.description: What does our country really need? We need to make sure every citizen gets enough to eat, clothe themselves and opportunity to enrich themselves using good quality education, and employment.

item.title: The Risks involved in Love and Babies
item.description: I lead a straightforward and simple life. I work, have light conversations with my colleagues during lunch, come back to my flat, cook, hang out with my flatmates or other friends, read, sing, Skype with family and friends in other countries, and watch series like Star Trek and Grey’s Anatomy.

item.title: LfE 27: Home
item.description: 22/08/2010 Hello everyone ðŸ™‚ I hope everything is going well with all of you. This is the final mail I’ll send from Edinburgh to all of you because my magical and memorable year has come to an end.

item.title: LfE 15: A visit to Oxford and Thoughts in Slough
item.description: 29/12/2009 Hello ðŸ™‚ I have been in Slough, a town near London, for around two weeks now. It has been restful to spend time with family, watch movies, go shopping etc.
